StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>In the Gerudo region, heat-resistant
clothes are tremendously valuable...and
clothes for men are incredibly rare.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>"But wait," you ask, "if men are forbidden
from Gerudo Town, <sp:5:0:0>do clothes like that
even exist?"
Well, I heard that there's a hidden shop
in Gerudo Town that specializes in that
very thing!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>How could any lover of fashion not be
curious about style so secretive?
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Trouble>The <clr:0000>southeastern part of the desert<clr:ffff> is
absolutely lousy with sinkholes... I get
scared just thinking of falling in.
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:ffff>Why would <clr:0000>Misko <clr:ffff>hide their <clr:0000>clothes<clr:ffff>
somewhere so dangerous?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Those pieces must be so rare, Misko
didn't want anyone to have them!
Yiga_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Wait.<sp:5:0:0> It's not just the tights—you're in the
full set! Look at you, all coordinated.<sp:0:4:0>I'd never have the courage to pull that off.
For a variety of reasons...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>But even that outfit couldn't fool me!<sp:5:0:0> 
I knew it was you right away.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>So you won't hear this from anybody in
Gerudo Town, but...

there's apparently a secret shop
somewhere in the town that sells
heat-resistant clothing.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Not too surprising, right? Well, get a load
of this. That clothing...is for MEN!

Pretty mysterious, huh? Especially since
men aren't allowed in Gerudo Town.
Makes me want to investigate!
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Do you know about <clr:0000>sinkholes<clr:ffff>, my prince?
They're, uh, holes with sand flowing into
them...that can you sink into.
Perhaps that description wasn't terribly
helpful, but there are lots in the <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>part of the desert<clr:ffff>, so be careful!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Legend has it that the bandit Misko hid
their treasured <clr:0000>clothing<clr:ffff> around there...

But what kind of clothing is so precious
that you need to hide it in a sea of
sandy deathtraps?
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS_01>Aaah!<sp:0:4:0>Well, if it isn't the prince who saved me
from the Yiga Clan! What a miracle that
we'd meet again!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>You know, it's strange... I've heard that
there's heat-resistant clothing for MEN
in Gerudo Town.
But men are famously forbidden in
Gerudo Town, so what's the story there?

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Given the target clientele, I'd bet that it's
being sold in some secret shop, hidden
away from all the others.
But where could that shop be? Ugh, so
many questions, so few answers.
FriendGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Notice_00>Oh! To think we'd meet again, my prince...
And here, no less! Perhaps it's fate?
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>I'm so curious about Gerudo Town's
secret shop. I mean, a clothing shop for
men in a town that doesn't admit them?
They supposedly sell heat-resistant
clothes, but who's actually buying them?
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>I want to know what kind of <clr:0000>clothing
Misko hid<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> so I'm tempted to make my
way to the <clr:0000>southeast part of the desert<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>
But the idea of falling into one of those
sinkholes is nightmarish enough that
I think I'll keep my distance.
Yiga:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Are those...<sp:5:1:0> Yes! The tights I made!<sp:0:4:0>They suit you so well! <sp:5:1:0>Look, they're just
your size and everything.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>There's a rumor that the bandit Misko
hid some of their <clr:0000>treasure <clr:ffff>in the <clr:0000>desert
southeast<clr:ffff> of here.
And get this—that "treasure" is supposed
to be part of Misko's <clr:0000>legendary wardrobe<clr:ffff>!
Pretty cool right?!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Only problem is all the sinkholes around
there. I'm not sure cool clothes are worth
getting buried alive in a sandy pit...
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>The daytime heat in the Gerudo Desert
and Gerudo Canyon sure is brutal, huh?

Apparently, someone's selling heat-
resistant men's clothing somewhere
in Gerudo Town.
But if guys aren't allowed into Gerudo
Town, how are they supposed to buy it?
And where would they even sell it?
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkDeny>Heat-resistant clothing would really come
in handy in the Gerudo Desert...

If you want some that's tailored for a man,
you'll have to find a secret shop in a town
that explicitly forbids men.
You really have to wonder what kind of
shop can operate like that. Makes me
even more curious to find it!
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Trouble>What was Misko thinking, hiding those
<clr:0000>clothes <clr:ffff>in a far-off place like the
<clr:0000>southeast Gerudo Desert<clr:ffff>?
The distance would be one thing, but all
those sinkholes... I'm too scared for my
wellbeing to actually look for those duds.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Have you heard about the bandit Misko,
my prince?

They say that long ago, Misko hid their
<clr:0000>clothing collection<clr:ffff> all over this land.

Apparently, one piece of that collection is
in the <clr:0000>southeast Gerudo Desert<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble>But that region's filled with sinkholes.<sp:5:1:0>
I'd rather not meet a sandy demise, so
I'll pass on looking for that one.
